logoPrompt: Create a professional, modern logo for Coastal Breeze Spa. Use calming tones of blue and green, incorporating elements of waves and tranquility. The design should be elegant and reflect a sense of wellness and relaxation, suitable for a high-end spa.

hero.headline: Experience Ultimate Relaxation by the Seaside
hero.subheadline: Indulge in rejuvenating treatments at Coastal Breeze Spa in Bournemouth.

about.title: Welcome to Coastal Breeze Spa
about.description: Nestled by the serene beaches of Bournemouth, Coastal Breeze Spa offers a unique blend of relaxation and luxury. Our expert therapists provide rejuvenating massages, invigorating facials, and soothing aromatherapy, all designed to bring you serenity and peace.
about.imagePrompt: Capture a professional, photorealistic image of a calming spa environment by the beach. Include massage tables, soft lighting, and ocean views, evoking a sense of peace and relaxation.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Experience a wide range of treatments designed to rejuvenate your body and mind.

items.title: Massage Therapy
items.description: Relieve tension and improve circulation with our range of massage techniques.

items.title: Facials
items.description: Refresh your skin with our custom facial treatments, designed to nourish and revitalize.

items.title: Body Wraps
items.description: Detoxify and rejuvenate with our luxurious body wraps, using mineral-rich ingredients.

items.title: Aromatherapy
items.description: Enhance your wellbeing with our aromatic treatments using essential oils.

items.title: Experienced Therapists
items.description: Our skilled therapists are trained to provide exceptional service tailored to your needs.

items.title: Scenic Location
items.description: Enjoy our treatments in a tranquil beachfront setting, perfect for unwinding.

items.title: Flexible Appointments
items.description: We offer flexible scheduling options to fit your busy lifestyle.

gallery.title: Our Gallery
gallery.subtitle: A glimpse into the tranquil world of Coastal Breeze Spa

images.title: Relaxing Massage Room
images.description: A serene space with ocean views, perfect for unwinding.
images.imagePrompt: Photorealistic image of a massage room overlooking the ocean, with soft lighting and calming decor.

images.title: Luxurious Facial Treatment
images.description: Our facials leave you refreshed and revitalized.
images.imagePrompt: High-resolution image of a professional facial treatment in a tranquil spa setting.

images.title: Invigorating Body Wraps
images.description: Detoxify and renew with our body wrap treatments.
images.imagePrompt: Capture a professional, detailed image of a body wrap session in a soothing spa environment.

images.title: Aromatherapy Ambiance
images.description: Enhance your senses with our aromatic practices.
images.imagePrompt: Create a photorealistic image of aromatherapy candles and essential oils in a calming setting.

quotes.name: Jessica T.
quotes.quote: I felt completely rejuvenated after my visit to Coastal Breeze Spa. Their service is unmatched!

quotes.name: David L.
quotes.quote: The location is beautiful and the treatments were exactly what I needed. Highly recommended!

items.question: Do I need to book an appointment?
items.answer: Yes, we recommend booking in advance to ensure availability.

items.question: What should I wear to the spa?
items.answer: Comfortable attire is recommended. Robes and slippers are provided during treatments.

items.question: Can I customize my treatment?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our therapists are happy to tailor treatments to fit your needs.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: We look forward to welcoming you to our tranquil spa. Reach out to schedule your next appointment or if you have any questions.
